abstract: Collation as an element in the production of digital critical editions is no longer in its infancy. The current article, based on the experience of editing a lengthy medieval prose text for the Estoria de Espanna Digital, addresses the theoretical and practical implications of using digital tools to collate extensive passages of medieval text.
article_title: The Estoria de Espanna Digital: Collating Medieval Prose-Challengesâ€¦ and More Challenges
journal_title: Digital Philology: A Journal of Medieval Cultures
